name: Tech Exports? Not Our Forte
title: Minimal High-Technology Exports
description: In 2022, Belize's high-technology exports were valued at just $17, making up a mere 0.00018% of its manufactured exports. This indicates a minimal focus on high-tech industries.

name: ICT Investments on the Rise
title: Growing ICT Investments
description: In 2019, Belize invested $8.6 million in public-private partnerships for ICT, showcasing a commitment to enhancing its digital infrastructure.

name: Youth Health Challenge
title: Children Living with HIV
description: As of 2022, there are 100 children aged 0-14 living with HIV in Belize, highlighting a significant public health challenge.
